definition: variant of 擔心|担心[dan1 xin1]

sentences.english: A security guard with us all the time.
sentences.chinese: 耽心安全？帥哥保安不離左右。

sentences.english: Fear will often find proof for itself.
sentences.chinese: 恐懼常常能找到耽心的證據。

sentences.english: Still others worry about finding the perfect choice.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些人耽心做不出完美的選擇。

sentences.english: A few people abandon oneself to heart " China still can hold to even how long " .
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至耽心“中國還能堅持多久”。

sentences.english: So we don't have to worry about that the crack will increase with time.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我們就不必耽心這種裂紋會隨時間而增大。

sentences.english: That kind of thing distracts us and keeps us from doing good.
sentences.chinese: 這些事情使我們耽心，並且妨礙我們做正當的事情。

sentences.english: When you fear the future you're wasting the present.
sentences.chinese: 當你爲今後耽心的時候，你就在浪費現在。

sentences.english: They will be automatically transfered to Pan am. Don't worry.
sentences.chinese: 他們自動會換到泛美去，別耽心。

definition: variant of 擔憂|担忧[dan1 you1]
to worry/to be on one's mind
for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
to fret/to get impatient/to become anxious
